name: Starcrossed & Moonshot
description:
Saturn is a long way from Earth and you could only afford a ticket for one. The love of your life stayed behind. The distance is unbearable so you must buy a ticket for them to join you!

  • Fly between the moons of Saturn 
  • Visit all the weird and wonderful cats who live here
  • Buy and sell the things they make
  • Earn enough to buy a ticket for your love

Made for the Game Off 2020 game jam
